QuestData.Title: They've Got The Goods!
QuestData.Description: The Saberon...they weren't just after prisoners...$b$b<Cough>...they took all the merchandise too.$b$bKidnapping is one thing...but stealing a goblin's merchandise? That's making things personal!$b$b<Cough>...Pyxni ain't going to be happy unless you get all of the stolen goods back. Make your way into Sabermaw and steal back all our merch.$b$bWhen you're done, make your way back to Pyxni at the Ring of Trials.$b$bShe'll make it worth your while...
QuestData.CompletionText: Greexlex told you that the saberon stole our merchandise?$b$bWell, what are you standing around for? Get your butt over to Sabermaw and get it back!$b$bTime is money!
QuestData.RewardText: You recovered the merchandise? Fantastic!$b$b<Pyxni rummages through the bags.>$b$bIt's all here too! I knew I could count on you! Here, take this reward.$b$bYou've earned it!
